item.description:
It's not a Halloween type event, BUT it is the next best thing to do in October... drink beer at OKTOBERFEST!


This fun, family, friendly event will feature traditional German food, music and craft beers in the beer tent!

There will be games and activities for all ages! Bring the family for a great day of fun, froth and food!

In addition to several high end German race cars being displayed
during the event the Chamber will be holding a special silent auction sponsored by Veloz Media. For the car and race enthusiast, two rides in regulation race cars at race track in Loudon, NH will be offered as a silent auction item.


Enjoy music by the Oberlaendler Hofbrau Band all day!


Coming back this year Schnitzels & Giggles as one of the food vendors!

 

What you NEED to know about the event:

Address:
Another address you may get the address 202 Merrimac Street for this park, the park is set back from Merrimac Street, and you can get to it from a few Streets.  When you see the BIG tent in a park, then that is it.  It is pretty much behind Leary's Liquor store, but you have to take one of these streets to get to it.

 

Weather:
This event is going on RAIN or shine!!

Fees/Admission:
Admission $5.00 for everyone over the age of 21, remember to bring your ID!  There will be a fee for food, beer and games.

Parking:

They have a 2 HUGE parking lots and then another behind the Towle Building. If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you!

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

I have this event scheduled this event on 2 of my Meetup groups, so if you see more people at the event then you expect that is the reason.

 

Hope to see you there!
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: I will be leaning against my car, which I will park on Sally Snyder Way, which is the road that will be behind the tent, facing the water, if you can't find me call the Meetup phone.
item.name: Oktoberfest!!!
